damage_kinetic.title: Kinyetic Damyage
damage_kinetic.body: Kinyetic damyage is gweat against shields, but poor against armor.

damage_highexplosive.title: High Expwosive Damyage
damage_highexplosive.body: High expwosive damyage is great against armor, but poor against shields.

damage_fragmentation.title: Fwagmyentation Damage
damage_fragmentation.body:
Fwagmyentation damage is very poor against both armor and shields. However, weapons dealing fragmentation damage usually have a very high DPS, making them devastating vs lightly-armored, unshielded targets such as light fighters and missiles.

It can also be highly effective against a ship whose armor is stripped away by battle damage.

damage_energy.title: Enyewgy Damyage
damage_energy.body: Enyewgy damyage is equally effective against shields and armor.

damage_other.title: Othew Damyage
damage_other.body: This weapon is speciaw. In reality, though, if you're seeing this, it's probably a bug.

fleetPoints.title: Depwoymyent points
fleetPoints.body: You nyeed avaiwable deploymyent points to deploy your reserves into battle. Wetreating or losing ships gives you back the points used to deploy them.

commandPoints.title: Commyand Points
commandPoints.body:
You nyeed commyand points to cweate assignments and give direct orders to your fleet.

Once you run out, you won't be able to give any more orders, but can still order your fleet to engage the enemy at will by cancelling all existing assignments.

You gain a few command points every time your forces capture an objective.

warroom.combatTime:
Timye ewapsed with both fleets in contact with each other.

The peak performance time of reinforcements is reduced by half of the combat time.

tooltipCaptain.body: Assign a captain (youwself or an officer) to this ship. The ship will benyefit from the captain's skills.

tooltipGive.title: Stowe
tooltipGive.body: Twansfer this %s from your fleet. Its combat readinyess will remyain unchanged while it's in storage.

tooltipMothball.title: Myothbawl
tooltipMothball.body:
Myothbawled %ss can't be used in combat or repaired, and do nyot provide any fuel, cargo, or personnel capacity.

Mothballing a ship will reduce its combat readiness to zero; restoring it will require timye and supplies.

tooltipUnmothball.title: Myothbawl
tooltipUnmothball.body:
Myothbawled %ss can't be used in combat or repaired, and do nyot provide any fuel, cargo, or personnel capacity.

Westoring this ship's combat readiness after unmyothballing it will consume %s supplies over %s day(s).

tooltipScuttle.title: Scuttwe
tooltipScuttle.body: Stwip this %s of anything useful, gainying %d supplies, %d fuel, and %d heavy myachinery.

tooltipSuspendRepairs.title: Suspend Wepaiws & Recovery
tooltipSuspendRepairs.body: Pwevents this %s from performying repairs or recovering combat readinyess. Full repairs and CW recovery will consume approximately %s supplies over %s days if allowed to proceed.

tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.title: Suspend Wepaiws & Recovery
tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.body: Pwevents this %s from performying repairs or recovering combat readinyess. This %s does not currently require repairs or CW recovery.

tooltipLogisticalPriority.body: %ss with wogistical priority get first pick of crew and supplies available for repairs.

misc.jumpPointNormal: Jump points can be used to twansit between hyperspace and nyormyal space. Some jump points also lead to other destinations.
misc.jumpPointStar: The gwavity well of a star is deep enyough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace. Using one is, however, extremyely difficult and dangerous.
misc.jumpPointGasGiant: The gwavity well of a gas giant is often deep enyough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace.
